short_description: amer kebek is a distilleries & malt processing company based in canada.
long_description: from our land and designed in a traditional way, our bitters are an endless source of creativity. make the people that taste her creations live a nostalgic trip throughout their gustative memories. student at mcgill university in nutrition and ecology, this young man, native from bedford, started in the field of spirits by making rhum in the caiman islands where his spirits won multiple awards. we trust amer kebek will be classed among the rare bitter companies to be issued from a micro-distillery that produces its alcohol form the grain. for the distillerie de la chaufferie, the circular economic englobing the product « amer kebek« will be part of the entreprise. a great synergy settles down between the spirits, mixology and gastronomy. create an original base that is quebecois and tasty, that's other artists of the industry could use in order to create their own masterpieces.
business_tags: wild mushrooms | distillery | cocktail recipes | cocktails | gastronomy | wild berry | bartending | creation live
generated_description: amer kebek, legally known as quebecois artisanal company, is a quebecois artisanal company based in quebec city. the company specializes in producing bitters made from local and boreal ingredients, including flowers, forest elements, wild mushrooms, and walnuts. founded by claudia, who brings a background in communications and a passion for visual arts, cooking, and photography, amer kebek emphasizes the use of hand-harvested products. claudia aims to elevate mixology and gastronomy by incorporating a unique "terroir" approach, focusing on the symbiosis between art, nature, and local production. the company also collaborates with other local producers, contributing to a circular economic model.
generated_business_tags: locally sourced ingredients | gastronomic art | bitters manufacturer | retail | cocktail bartending services | artisanal production
